name: MonsterS in haha Island (群妖志)
description: To be immortal, The most important thing is to have a long life.Our hero wants to be immortal, so he came to this island to find the secret of longevity in frogs.
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowS 7/8//10 Processor: core i-3 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Storage: 100 MB available space
